name: NSCloudSharingServiceDelegate
desc: A set of methods for responding to the life cycle events of the cloud-sharing service.

items.name: func sharingService(NSSharingService, didCompleteForItems: [Any], error: Error?)
items.desc: Tells the delegate when the cloud-sharing service completes.

items.name: func sharingService(NSSharingService, didSave: CKShare)
items.desc: Tells the delegate when the cloud-sharing service saves the CloudKit share.

items.name: func sharingService(NSSharingService, didStopSharing: CKShare)
items.desc: Tells the delegate when the user stops sharing the CloudKit share.

items.name: func options(for: NSSharingService, share: NSItemProvider) -> NSSharingService.CloudKitOptions
items.desc: Asks the delegate for the participant options for the cloud-sharing service.

items.name: struct NSSharingService.CloudKitOptions
items.desc: Constants that describe how a participant can configure a CloudKit share.
